title: Ogboni Chief's Textile
medium: Cotton, indigo dyed; sixteen strips of plain weave, joined by hand stitching; embroidered with wool in chain stitches; edged with cotton, buttonhole stitched uncut fringe
dimensions: 162.5 × 275.6 cm (64 × 108 1/2 in.); Approximate strip: W.: 10 cm (4 in.)
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. O. Renard Goltra Fund
